title: Strengthening deep learning practical competencies: Culture-based geometric learning design: Invention-type ethnomathematics with GeoGebra

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometric concepts understanding and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze geometric principles found in traditional cultural heritage (e.g., hanok, traditional patterns) with 85% accuracy
Learners can reconstruct and transform geometric shapes in 3D using Geogebra tools in VR-based simulation environments
Learners can complete geometry problem-solving projects reflecting cultural contexts with 90% completion through collaborative learning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
